common.comingSoonBody: Tunamalizia kipengele hiki. Tafadhali rudi baada ya muda mfupi.

dashboard.title: Ulinzi wa Phishing wa AI
dashboard.subtitle: Baki mbele ya ulaghai kwa ulinzi wa AI wa papo hapo uliobinafsishwa kwa ajili yako.

statusCard.title: Uko salama
statusCard.description: Uchunguzi wa phishing unaendelea kimyakimya nyuma ya pazia.

hero.activeDescription: Uchunguzi wa phishing unaendelea kimyakimya nyuma ya pazia.
hero.pausedDescription: Idhinisha ruhusa zilizokosekana ili kugundua udanganyifu kuendelee.
hero.pausedHelper: Ngao imezimwa, na mashambulio ya ulaghai yanaweza kupenya. Geuza swichi uiwashe tena!

trend.flat: Bado iko sawasawa na kipindi kilichopita

mockScan.title: Endesha uchunguzi wa mfano
mockScan.subtitle: Nenda kwenye kithibiti ili kuanzisha kugundua kwa sampuli.

alerts.title: Tazama tahadhari
alerts.subtitle: Fungua historia yako yote ya ugunduzi.

stats.title: Takwimu za ulinzi
stats.subtitle: Angalia mwenendo wa ujumbe uliokaguliwa na vitisho vilivyokataliwa.

trusted.title: Watumaji wa kuaminika
trusted.subtitle: Kagua na dhibiti mawasiliano ulioweka kuwa salama.

developer.title: Zana za msanidi
developer.subtitle: Weka upya mwongozo wa kwanza na uangalie ruhusa tena.

model.title: Masasisho ya mfano
model.subtitle: Angalia uboreshaji wa kigunduzi na dhibiti matoleo yaliyosakinishwa.

report.title: Ripoti ujumbe
report.subtitle: Tuma ujumbe wa kutiliwa shaka ili kusaidia kuimarisha ngao.

activity.title: Shughuli za hivi karibuni
activity.empty: Bado hakuna ugunduzi. Endesha uchunguzi wa mfano kuona tahadhari zitakavyokuwa.

recentAlerts.title: Tahadhari za hivi karibuni
recentAlerts.subtitle: Ujumbe wa kutiliwa shaka uliovuliwa na ngao yako.
recentAlerts.empty: Hakuna tahadhari kwa sasa. Endelea kuwa makini!
recentAlerts.emptyWithFilters: Hakuna tahadhari zinazolingana na {{filters}}. Jaribu kubadilisha vichujio vyako.

filters.historical: Seti ya data ya moja kwa moja

trustedToggle.label: Onyesha watumaji uliowaamini pekee
trustedToggle.description: Chuja matokeo kwa watumaji ulioweka kuwa salama ndani ya Mipangilio.

feedback.title: Je, onyo hili lilikuwa sahihi?
feedback.subtitle: Tuambie kama hili lilikuwa jaribio halisi la ulaghai au tahadhari ya uongo.
feedback.error: Hatukuweza kutuma maoni hayo. Jaribu tena.

recentAlerts.searchPlaceholder: Tafuta tahadhari kwa mtumaji, maudhui, au tag
recentAlerts.trustedDefault: Uliweka mtumaji huyu kuwa salama kwenye Mipangilio.
recentAlerts.historyAlertBody: Utaweza kuangalia historia yote ya tahadhari kwenye hatua inayofuata.

items.preview: Dai marejesho yako ya kodi sasa. Bofya kiungo hiki…
Haraka: Thibitisha maelezo yako ya malipo ili kuepuka kusimamishwa.
Tumeweka pesa kwenye akaunti yako. Tafadhali thibitisha mara moja!

trustedSources.title: Watumaji wa kuaminika
trustedSources.subtitle: Simamia watu au anwani ulizoweka kuwa salama.

report.title: Ripoti ujumbe
report.subtitle: Shiriki ujumbe unaotia shaka bila kujulikana ili kuimarisha ngao.
report.modalSubtitle: Paste details of anything that looks risky. We'll sync it once you're back online.

placeholders.message: Paste or describe the suspicious message here...
placeholders.comment: Add context, e.g. why it looks risky.

status.heading: Report status
status.idle: Queued reports send automatically when a secure connection is available.
status.success: Report queued successfully. Thanks for training the shield!
status.error: We couldn't queue the report. Please try again.

validation.messageRequired: Add the suspicious message so we know what to review.

disabled.title: Manual reporting disabled
disabled.body: Turn on manual reports in Settings → Data & telemetry to send suspicious messages.

report.loadingBody: We're still loading your reporting preferences. Try again in a moment.

expoGoNotice.title: Kikomo cha Expo Go
expoGoNotice.body: Uchunguzi wa nyuma husimama kwenye Expo Go. Tengeneza mteja wa maendeleo au programu huru ili ngao iendelee kufanya kazi hata ukifunga programu.

permissionsReminder.title: Washa ruhusa muhimu
permissionsReminder.body: Washa arifa na SMS ili ngao ichanganue ujumbe kiotomatiki.

messagesScanned.title: Jinsi ukaguzi unavyofanya kazi
messagesScanned.body: Ujumbe unachambuliwa mara moja ndani ya kifaa unapoonekana. Hii inachanganya sampuli za data na majaribio yako ili kuonyesha jinsi ngao ilivyokuwa ikifanya kazi.

threatsBlocked.title: Kuhusu vitisho vilivyozuiliwa
threatsBlocked.body: Ngao hutangaza chochote kinachoonekana kuwa na hatari, iwe ni kutoka kwa sampuli za zamani au majaribio yako. Tumia hili kupima mara ngapi wajaribu wanaonekana.

safeMessages.title: Kuelewa ujumbe salama
safeMessages.body: Hesabu za usalama hukadiria ni ujumbe mingapi imepitia ukaguzi. Huondoa vilivyotiliwa shaka kutoka kwa vyote vilivyokaguliwa ili uone wakati kikasha chako kinabaki safi.

mockDetection.title: Fanya uchunguzi wa mfano
mockDetection.subtitle: Washa kaguzi ya nyuma kwa kutumia ujumbe wa sampuli ili kuona tahadhari zitakavyoonekana.
mockDetection.helper: Kama tishio la mfano litatambuliwa, maelezo yataonekana hapa na utapokea arifa ya ndani.
mockDetection.successBody: Angalia eneo la arifa ili kuona jinsi itakavyoonekana moja kwa moja.
mockDetection.noThreatBody: Sampuli zote kwa sasa zinaonekana salama. Jaribu tena baadaye!
mockDetection.errorBody: Hatukuweza kuendesha kaguzi ya mfano sasa. Funga programu na uifungue tena kisha ujaribu upya.
mockDetection.noResultPlaceholder: Endesha kaguzi ya mfano ili uone jinsi tahadhari zitakavyokuwa ndani ya programu.
mockDetection.noMatches: Hakuna kiolezo mahususi cha phishing kilicholingana, lakini ujumbe bado unaonekana kuwa na hatari.
mockDetection.safePreviewSubtitle: Hivi ndivyo kaguzi inavyotafsiri ujumbe unaoonekana kuwa wa kuaminika.
mockDetection.safeSampleUnavailableBody: Hatukupata sampuli yenye hatari ndogo kwa sasa. Jaribu uchunguzi mwingine.
mockDetection.clearedBody: Kadi ya kugundua mfano imewekwa upya.

onboarding.title: Washa Ngao yako ya AI
onboarding.subtitle: Pitia maelezo mafupi ili ujue programu inafanya nini na kwa nini tunahitaji ruhusa.

skipDialog.title: Unataka kuruka ruhusa muhimu?
skipDialog.body: Bila arifa na SMS, ngao haiwezi kufuatilia mashambulio kiotomatiki. Unaweza kuwasha baadaye kupitia mipangilio.

onboarding.permissionNoteBody: Baada ya mwongozo huu mfupi utaruhusu arifa na SMS.

permissions.title: Weka ngao ikiendelea
permissions.subtitle: Washa ruhusa hizi ili tuchanganue ujumbe mara tu unapowasili.

notifications.title: Ruhusa ya arifa
notifications.description: Turuhusu kuchanganua WhatsApp, Messenger, Gmail na zingine papo hapo.

sms.title: Ruhusa ya SMS
sms.description: Turuhusu tusome SMS zinazoingia ili kupata ujumbe wa shaka mara moja.
sms.unavailable: Ruhusa ya SMS si lazima kwenye kifaa hiki.

permissions.incompleteBody: Washa arifa na SMS ili ngao ifanye kazi kiotomatiki.

slides.title: Kaa mbele ya walaghai
slides.description: Tunachanganua SMS na arifa kwenye kifaa chako ili kugundua udukuzi papo hapo.

slides.title: Faragha yako ni muhimu
slides.description: Uchambuzi wote hufanyika nje ya mtandao. Ujumbe hauondoki kwenye kifaa chako wala kuhifadhiwa kwenye wingu.

slides.title: Tu ruhusu upatikanaji sahihi
slides.description: Tutaomba ruhusa za SMS na arifa ili tuweze kukulinda kimyakimya nyuma ya pazia.

permissions.title: Ruhusa ya arifa
permissions.description: Ili tuchanganue WhatsApp, Messenger, Gmail na nyingine mara moja.

permissions.title: Ruhusa ya kusoma SMS
permissions.description: Inahitajika kuchanganua ujumbe wa shaka mara unapoingia.

settings.title: Mipangilio
settings.subtitle: Dhibiti lugha, arifa na utambuzi. Huu ni ukurasa wa muda hadi tuunganishe mipangilio kamili.

diagnostics.errorBody: Tumepata hitilafu tukitengeneza picha elekezi. Jaribu tena ukiwa na muunganisho thabiti.
diagnostics.shareErrorBody: Hatukuweza kushiriki picha elekezi. Tafadhali jaribu tena.
diagnostics.disclaimer: Upakuaji huu hauna maudhui ya kibinafsi. Shiriki tu na wahudumu unaowaamini.

telemetry.title: Ushirikiano wa vitisho
telemetry.description: Dhibiti jinsi tahadhari na ripoti zinavyoshirikiwa na AI Phishing Shield ili kuboresha modeli.
telemetry.autoUploadSubtitle: Shiriki metadata isiyo na utambulisho pale tunapogundua kitu kinachotia shaka.
telemetry.manualReportsSubtitle: Washa njia ya kuripoti kutoka dashibodi unapogundua ujumbe wa shaka.
telemetry.errorBody: Hatukuweza kuhifadhi mapendeleo yako. Tafadhali jaribu tena.

language.title: Lugha
language.description: Badilisha kati ya Kiingereza, Kifaransa, Kiswahili, Kiyoruba, Kiigbo, Kihausa, Pidgin, Kiarabu na Kiamhari.

deviceDefault.title: Linganishwa na lugha ya kifaa
deviceDefault.description: Hakikisha programu inafuata lugha kuu ya kifaa chako.

notifications.title: Arifa
notifications.description: Dhibiti sauti ya tahadhari, mtetemo na hali ya ruhusa.
notifications.errorBody: We couldn't save these notification settings. Please try again.
notifications.permissionGranted: Notifications are enabled at the system level.
notifications.permissionMissing: Turn on notification access to let the shield alert you instantly.

masterToggle.title: Alerts
masterToggle.description: Turn phishing alerts on or off for this device.

sound.title: Play sound
sound.description: Play a tone when a phishing alert is detected.

vibration.title: Vibrate on alert
vibration.description: Trigger vibration feedback when alerts fire.

quietHours.title: Quiet hours
quietHours.helper: Tap to rotate through preset quiet-hour windows.

trustedSources.title: Watumaji wa kuaminika
trustedSources.description: Simamia namba za simu au barua pepe unazoamini.
trustedSources.emptyState: Bado hakuna mawasiliano ya kuaminika. Ongeza mistari ya benki, mawasiliano ya HR au washirika muhimu unaotegemea.
trustedSources.validationHandle: Weka jina au nambari kamili ya mtumaji unayetaka kuamini.
trustedSources.duplicateBody: Mtumaji huyu tayari amewekwa kuwa wa kuaminika kwa njia hiyo.
trustedSources.errorBody: Hatukuweza kusasisha watumaji wa kuaminika. Tafadhali jaribu tena.
trustedSources.modalSubtitle: Hifadhi anwani rasmi ili tahadhari ziwe na muktadha sahihi.

diagnostics.title: Utambuzi
diagnostics.description: Tuma kumbukumbu zisizo na majina kusaidia kuboresha ugunduzi.

model.title: Masasisho ya mfano
model.description: Sakinisha mifano mipya ya kugundua phishing na dhibiti matoleo.

model.title: Usimamizi wa mfano
model.subtitle: Pakua masasisho, wezesha matoleo, na kagua historia ya usakinishaji.
model.offlineFallbackBanner: Couldn't reach the live registry. Showing the built-in demo catalog for now.

catalogMode.description: Switch between live registry updates and the offline demo catalog. Live mode downloads real model files.

details.currentStatusActive: This model is currently powering phishing detection.
details.noActive: No model is active yet. Install and activate a version to start scanning.

alerts.installSuccessBody: Toleo {{version}} sasa linafanya kazi kwenye kifaa chako.
alerts.installErrorBody: Hatukuweza kuongeza toleo {{version}}. Tafadhali jaribu tena muda mfupi baadaye.
alerts.activateSuccessBody: Toleo {{version}} sasa ndilo kigunduzi kinachofanya kazi.
alerts.activateErrorBody: Hatukuweza kubadilisha mfano. Tafadhali jaribu tena.
alerts.removeConfirmBody: Kuondoa toleo {{version}} kunatoa nafasi ya hifadhi. Unaweza kulisakinisha tena ukihitaji.
alerts.removeSuccessBody: Toleo {{version}} limefutwa kutoka kwenye hifadhi ya ndani.
alerts.removeErrorBody: Hatukuweza kuondoa toleo {{version}}. Jaribu tena baada ya kulinganisha.
alerts.syncErrorBody: Hatukuweza kusasisha katalogi. Hakikisha una muunganisho kisha ujaribu tena.

resetOnboarding.title: Weka upya mwongozo wa kwanza
resetOnboarding.successBody: Tumefuta hali ya mwongozo. Fungua programu tena ili kuanza safari upya.
resetOnboarding.errorBody: Hatukuweza kufuta hali ya mwongozo. Jaribu tena.
